Pro-Glycolic 10% Resurfacing Gel - Glycolic Acid Toner | TULA Skincare
Alcohol-free gel toner gently removes excess dirt and oil while balancing the skin.

This alcohol-free toner uses probiotics, glycolic acid, and beetroot extract to gently exfoliate the skin, leaving it looking smooth, hydrated and more even.

Suitable for:oily, dry, normal, combination, sensitive, mature skin

2.7 fl oz / 80 ml

94%

agree their skin felt smoother after just 4 weeks

85%

agree their skin tone looked more even after just 4 weeks

88%

agree their fine lines & wrinkles appeared softened after just 4 weeks

questions

<
How do I fit the resurfacing gel into my regimen?

Use the gel as your toning step right after cleansing, morning and night.

How is this product different than all the other toners I've seen?

Many toners on the market use a high percentage of alcohol which is extremely drying, and strips the skin. TULA's gel provides the same benefits as many toners (e.g. resurfaces and deep cleans) without drying out your skin.

The benefits

  • Alcohol-free formula combines 100% natural probiotics and glycolic acid to gently sloughs off dead skin cells and remove excess dirt and oil (without over drying!).
  • Removes impurities and diminishes the appearance of pores after cleansing.
  • Deeply hydrates and conditions the skin for more radiance and glow.

How to use

After cleansing, pump gel onto cotton pad and apply evenly over face.

WHATS INSIDE

  • Pro-GlycolicComplex proprietary blend of 100% natural lactobacillus probiotics and glycolic acid helps tone and exfoliate skin and removes excess oil and debris.
  • Natural Mushroom + Beet Extract is 400X more hydrating than hyaluronic acid alone.
  • Turmeric Extract is a powerful antioxidant that helps reduce signs of inflammation.
  • Blueberry Extractnatural anti-oxidant helps to fight free radical damage.
See the full ingredients list
Probiotic strains
  • Lactococcus Ferment Lysate

    Hydrates and locks in moisture.

Claims
  • Sulfate-free
  • Fragrance-free
